nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.a3.maze.actors

Class Actor

  • java.lang.Object
    • nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.a3.maze.GameObject
      • nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.a3.maze.actors.Actor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bug, Filler, FireBall, Glider, Player, Tank, Teeth

    public abstract class Actor
extends GameObject
    Actors represent either a computer player or human player.
    Author:
    Tim - Creator, Mike - Contributor
    See Also:

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Actor(ActorType type)
      Creates an Actor with just a type.
      Actor(Position pos, ActorType type)
      Creates an Actor with both a position and type, this is deprecated as position should no longer be stored in the class itself but handled by the board itself.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Actor

        public Actor(Position pos,
             ActorType type)
        Creates an Actor with both a position and type, this is deprecated as position should no longer be stored in the class itself but handled by the board itself.
        Parameters:
        pos - The position of the actor
        type - The type of the actor

      • Actor

        public Actor(ActorType type)
        Creates an Actor with just a type.
        Parameters:
        type - The type of the Actor - Should not be passed as a parameter, but hardcoded by each class that extends Actor.
